experience.description: Designed and implemented RESTful APIs using Java and the Spring Boot framework. Optimized C++ backend modules for high-performance data processing, reducing latency by 20%. Participated in daily stand-ups and code reviews to ensure high-quality software delivery.

Assisted in the development of cross-platform desktop applications using C++. Developed automated unit tests in Java, increasing code coverage by 30%. Resolved over 50 identified bugs in the legacy codebase during the internship period.

metadata.experience_level: Prior internship/job experience(s) in the job field.
